data.prayer: Father, we pray that the state of Basse-Terre be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Basse-Terre, Guadeloupe
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 19,084 believers in the state of Basse-Terre the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 20 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Basse-Terre.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Basse-Terre, Guadeloupe not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Sainte-Rose
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Sainte-Rose, Basse-Terre, Guadeloupe.
Spirit, guide seekers in Basse-Terre, Guadeloupe to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Basse-Terre, Guadeloupe, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.section_summary:
the state of Basse-Terre, Guadeloupe has a population of 400,600.

We estimate Basse-Terre has 19,084 people who might know Jesus, 362,268 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 19,248 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 20 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Basse-Terre.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
